title: #316 Simplified Filters (front end)
body:
Progress on #363 (and #316 indirectly)

Adds `Columns` dropdown menu
- Columns are shown/hidden based on user input
- Column setups are saved locally (refreshing displays the same column setup you were just looking at)

Adds filtering combobox
- Text searches over group and options
- Support for filters with multiple options (e.g. locales, releases)

Adds "active filters" section
- Filter setups are saved locally (refreshing displays the same filter setup you were just looking at)
- 'Reset filters' button
